attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitioners know that The Hunting Act 2004: has done nothing for animal welfare; threatens livelihoods in the longer term; ignores the findings of Lord Burn's Enquiry; gives succour to animal rights extremists; is based on political expedience following the Prime Minister's unconsidered response on the television programme Question Time in 1999; is framed to persecute a large minority who support a traditional activity; does not command popular support in the country except amongst the uninformed and mal-advised.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "repeal the Hunting Act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13968.asp

Prime Minister's Office
